Let $g(z)=z^n$. I would like to show $\vert p-g\vert<\vert g\vert$ on the boundary of the disc, where $\vert g \vert =R^n$ (on the boundary). $$\vert p-g\vert \le\vert c_{n-1}z^{n-1}\vert+\cdots+\vert c_1z\vert + \vert c_0\vert\\\le nR^{n-1}\max \vert c_i \vert$$ the latter is the best useful upper bound that I can find, but it is too large since I cannot show that it is less than $R^n$.
